The Golden Rule of Software Development

  • 19 Jan 2014
  • software
  • Byron Sommardahl

I’ve gone to church all my life and “The Golden Rule” has been pound into my head since I was a toddler: “Do to others as you would have them do to you.” That’s Jesus talking in Matthew 7:12, by the way. Now, I’m not going to preach, so don’t navigate away too quickly… Well, I’m not going to preach about the Bible anyhow. I guess I am going to preach a little about how...

The Golden Rule of Software Development

Who we are

Acklen Avenue is a .NET software development shop based in Nashville, TN with a near shore operation in Honduras. Acklen Avenue adheres to agile software development principles, including domain-driven design, test-driven development, SOLID engineering principles and continuos delivery.

Philosophy

Our philosophy is that code should be clean and easily upgradeable. We build software that is easy to manage so you won’t have a headache when you want to change something.
